moves.1. d4: Trying out a new moment as either way i'll win the game.
moves.1... d5: So far it is quite a normal game.
moves.3. Nc3: I also bring my knight out.
moves.4. Nf3: It seems like a 4 knights game apart from the bishop being in the game.
moves.4... Bg4: I threaten to put opponent in a bad opponent.
moves.5. Ne5: I move my knight out of the way.
moves.6. Bxe5: I take with my bishop because if I took with my pawn his pawn would be able to advance and threaten my knight.
moves.6... Ne4: I also go for a swap off.
moves.7. Nxe4: This time it is me as white excepting the exchange.
moves.7... dxe4: The only way I can take his knight- it seems as if my opponent is in the better position.
moves.8. h3: I attempt to scare his bishop away.
moves.8... Be6: There isn't much I could have done.
moves.9. Qd2: I move my queen out of the way so that I can castle in my next move.
moves.11. e3: I push my pawn to release my bishop.
moves.11... Bxa2: I, without thinking take the pawn.
moves.12. b3: Just what I had hoped for.
moves.12... f6: I push pawn to attack his bishop.
moves.14. cxb3: I capture his bishop but it leaves me in a bad position.
moves.14... a6: I push pawn for maybe in the future.
moves.15. Bc4: I put myself in a good position (I think).
moves.16. d5: I try and force his queen back.
moves.16... Qc5: I just push my queen forward.
moves.17. h4: I start advancing my end pawn.
moves.17... b5: I have his bishop trapped at the cost of my position.
moves.18. Qa2: Not much i can do to save my bishop.
moves.19... e5: I push my pawn two forward forgetting about n.p
That is exactly what I do but I get rid of his double pawns.
moves.20... Rxd1+: I take the oppurtunity of a swap off as I am in a better position.
moves.21... g5: I push my pawn in attempt for more exchanges.
moves.22. Qxa6+: I am back in the lead and I believe there is a checkmate on the way.
moves.23. Rd8#: And there you go- another game proving that I play better as white. I made quite a few mistakes in this game but that it is mostly because I was trying to play as fast as I can.
